Game Summary:

On Shallow Waters is a 3d action rougelike dungeon-crawler mobile game where you play as Kidd, the pirate captain of The Hades Abandoned. His fiancé, Anna went missing after having an encounter with the evil sea witch. Consumed by grief and anger, he decided to go on a journey to find and confront the Sea witch. With the help of the Sea Kings, he gained access to 5 legendary weapons that will aid his battles. He’s prepared to face whatever comes his way. Even death will not stop him.
